name: Fertile Grounds
title: Top Fertilizer Usage
description: In 2022, New Zealand led the world in fertilizer consumption with 1633.43 kilograms per hectare of arable land, ensuring rich and productive soil.

name: Stable and Secure
title: High Political Stability
description: In 2023, New Zealand demonstrated remarkable political stability with a low standard error of 0.205 and nine reliable sources confirming the absence of violence or terrorism.

name: Effortless Taxation
title: Minimal Tax Meetings
description: In 2023, businesses in New Zealand enjoyed streamlined tax processes, requiring only one meeting with tax officials on average.

name: Labor Excellence
title: Top Public Services for Labor
description: In 2024, New Zealand scored a perfect 100 in the adequacy of public services for labor, showcasing its commitment to workforce well-being.

name: Taxation Triumph
title: High Quality Tax Regulations
description: In 2024, New Zealand achieved a score of 75 for the quality of its tax regulations, reflecting a robust and fair taxation system.

name: Interest Rate Oddity
title: Negative Interest Rate Spread
description: In 2018, New Zealand experienced a unique economic situation with a negative interest rate spread of -3.26%, indicating an unusual financial environment.

name: Tariff Tacticians
title: Minimal Tariff Peaks
description: In 2022, New Zealand maintained a low share of tariff lines with international peaks, at just 0.017% for all products and 0.128% for primary products, promoting free trade.

name: Tax System Strength
title: Strong Overall Taxation Score
description: In 2024, New Zealand's taxation system was rated highly with an overall score of 71.74, reflecting efficient and effective tax policies.
